attributes.action: Cancel Donald Trump invitation for state visit
attributes.additional_details: His latest tweet was in response to Theresa May condemning him for his retweets of three videos from deputy leader of far right group Britain First (one of which was fake news as confirmed by Dutch Embassy).
attributes.background: This petition propose to cancel Donald Trump invitation for state visit in light of Donald Trump recent tweet where he poked fun at UK Prime Minister by telling her to focus on radical Islamic terror instead of condemning his far right views
